prompt¶

Classes¶

Prompt

A class to represent a prompt, a user written prompt, a prompt

Module Contents¶

class prompt.Prompt(ml_gateway: vikit.gateways.ML_models_gateway.MLModelsGateway = None)¶

Bases: abc.ABC

A class to represent a prompt, a user written prompt, a prompt generated from an audio file, or one sent or received from an LLM.

This class is going to be used as a base class for new type of prompts as they are accepted by LLM’s, like an image, a video, or an embedding…

property text: str¶

Returns the text of the prompt.

property subtitles: list[pysrt.SubRipItem]¶

Returns the subtitles of the prompt.

Raises:

ValueError: If the subtitles have not been prepared yet

get_duration() → float¶

Returns the duration of the prompt in seconds. This is not ideal and should be used only if we don’t have the recording of the prompt.
